item.title: Python Resources
item.description: The Official Python Documentation The Python Tutorial — Python 3.10.0 documentation unittest — Unit testing framework — Python 3.10.0 documentation 6. Modules — Python 3.10.0 documentation Books Robert Sedgewick, Kevin Wayne, Robert Dondero: Introduction to Programming in Python: An Interdisciplinary Approach. Pearson, 2015 The linked companion website contains excerpts and lots of examples: Elements of Programming Functions and Modules Object Oriented Programming Algorithms and Data Structures Automate the Boring Stuff with Python

item.title: IntelliJ
item.description: Learn IntelliJ There is now a guided way to learn this complex tool - this video introduces it: Learn IntelliJ IDEA (2021) - YouTube Code Formatting As soon as you share code using Source Code Management (e.g. Git), you should take care that everyone in the team uses the same code formatting - otherwise changes in formatting will make it hard to track and understand the real changes.
